Package com.jimmoores.quandl.util

Quandl wrapper utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RESTDataProvider
    An interface for abstracting the detail of getting a result object from the back-end, primarily to ease testing but also to remove code duplication.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArgumentChecker
    Utility class for checking arguments.
    DefaultRESTDataProvider
    Utility methods for fetching data from remote Quandl REST interface.
    PrettyPrinter
    Static utility class to PrettyPrint structures.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    QuandlRuntimeException
    A runtime exception from the Quandl client.
    QuandlTooManyRequestsException
    A runtime exception from the Quandl client indicating an HTTP 429 response code (Too many requests).
    QuandlUnprocessableEntityException
    A runtime exception from the Quandl client indicating an HTTP 422 response code (Unprocessable Entity).

Package com.jimmoores.quandl.util Description

Quandl wrapper utility classes.

These include:

  • {link ArgumentChecker} - for validating method arguments
  • {link PrettyPrinter} - for nicely tabulated ASCII output
  • {link RESTDataProvider} - interface for fetching documents. Default implementation does Jersey HTTP Client REST call. Other implementations are used for testing (saving responses in files and replaying responses.
  • {code Quandl*Exception} - Exceptions, extending from {link QuandlRuntimeException} for generic errors.
